name: NP Membership
description: A membership level for non-profit organizations. There is no fee for this membership.
benefits: Networking opportunities with other non-profit organizations

name: Bronze Membership
description: A basic membership level with a low annual fee.

name: Silver Membership
description: A premium membership level with additional perks and services.
benefits: Priority access to events and webinars

name: Gold Membership
description: The top membership level offering the most exclusive benefits.
benefits: Featured spotlight in the member directory
Free access to all events and webinars
Access to a private networking group
